local_intent: Close the gripper with force 20 to secure the brown object after executing a top grasp, then verify it is held.
assumptions: Perception can localize the brown object
coherence_with_global: Uses top grasp strategy on brown_object, performs CloseGripper(force=20, timeout_ms=1000), and verifies with ObjectInGripper, aligning with the global sequence around the grasp phase.
